Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2009 03:03AM sivanco wrote: You are a good best friend. I believe professional help for him would help both of them. He is probably in denial and drinking and being a jerk is his coping stragiities. The talk that helped me mentally the most was with my 8 month pregnant sister about my final wishes. Keep in mind most people will not let me talk about it because they think that I have given up. I have not, but it is facing reality if the treatment doesn't work. It will be harder for you than her to talk about it, but it will be helpful and let her start the topic, Just maybe ask her what she fears the most.
